subject: Shea Stadium (NYC)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets are not divulging many details about Sunday’s on-field farewell ceremony for Shea Stadium, but 45 former players, including Tom Seaver, Willie Mays and Mike Piazza, are expected to participate.
snippet: The Mets are not divulging many details about Sunday’s on-field farewell ceremony for Shea Stadium, but 45 former players, including Tom Seaver, Willie Mays and Mike Piazza, are expected to participate.
